Home.title: Viggle AI
Home.description: Explore the revolutionary world of Viggle AI, the cutting-edge platform that empowers creators to bring their characters to life with unparalleled ease.

About.title: About Us
About.content1: Welcome to viggle ai , here you can get the entrance for viggle ai. It's free to use and you can create the controllable motion video with viggle ai. It is the first video-3d foundation model with actual physics understanding, starting from making any character move as you want.
About.content2: At viggle ai video, we're not just building tools; we're crafting solutions that make a difference. Our goal is simple yet profound: to create AI applications that are not just smart, but indispensable to those who use them. With a deep understanding of AI generation technology, we're committed to developing products that are user-friendly, efficient, and powerful.
About.content3: Guided by our slogan, ‘Redefining Excellence with AI-Enhanced Tools,’ we strive to exceed expectations and set new standards in the tech industry. We believe that AI has the potential to enhance our lives in ways we've only just begun to imagine, and we're dedicated to making that vision a reality.
About.content4: Join us on this journey as we continue to push the limits of what's possible with AI, creating tools that are not just technologically advanced, but that also serve to inspire, educate, and empower.
About.content5: If you are interested with us, please contact us with email: contact@viggleaivideo.com.

one.description: You can input `/mix` in the discord with a character and mix it into a motion video.

col-one.2: Mix static image into motion video

two.title: Animate a static character with viggle ai
two.description: You can `/animate` a static character with a text motion prompt.

col-one.1: Animate with a static character image
col-one.2: Animate with a text motion prompt

col-two.1: Animate the character with the motion template

Footer.content: Generate the controllable motion video with Viggle AI .

1.question: What is Viggle AI?
1.answer: Viggle AI is a platform that allows users to create and control 3D character animations with ease, utilizing AI technology to simplify the animation process.

2.question: How do I get started with Viggle AI?
2.answer: To start using Viggle AI, join the Discord channel where the platform is integrated, and follow the simple steps to begin animating your characters.

3.question: What kind of content can I create with Viggle AI?
3.answer: With Viggle AI, you can create a wide range of content including animated videos, character designs, game assets, and VR/AR experiences.

4.question: Is there a learning curve to using Viggle AI?
4.answer: Viggle AI is designed to be user-friendly, allowing creators to animate characters without the need for extensive 3D modeling or animation knowledge.

5.question: Can I use Viggle AI for commercial projects?
5.answer: Yes, many users of Viggle AI have found success in creating commercial content, from video advertisements to educational materials.

6.question: How does Viggle AI differ from other animation tools?
6.answer: Viggle AI stands out by offering advanced AI-driven animation capabilities that simplify the process, allowing for rapid creation and customization of 3D characters.

7.question: Is there a cost associated with using Viggle AI?
7.answer: While there may be different tiers of access or features that come at a cost, Viggle AI also offers a free trial or basic access to allow users to explore the platform.

8.question: Is there any limit on using Viggle AI?
8.answer: Due to server capacity limits, you can create a maximum of 2 generations at peak times.  We are constantly optimizing the Viggle production experience for all users.

9.question: How does Viggle AI ensure the quality of animations?
9.answer: The platform uses advanced machine learning models to ensure high-quality animations that are smooth and lifelike.

privacyPolicy.1-p: This page is used to inform visitors regarding my policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use my Service. If you choose to use my Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation to this policy. The Personal Information that I collect is used for providing and improving the Service. I will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy. The terms used in this Privacy Policy have the same meanings as in our Terms and Conditions.
privacyPolicy.2-p: For a better experience, while using our Service, I may require you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information. The information that I request will be retained on your device and is not collected by me in any way. The app does use third-party services that may collect information used to identify you.
privacyPolicy.3-p: I want to inform you that whenever you use my Service, in a case of an error in the app I collect data and information (through third-party products) on your phone called Log Data. This Log Data may include information such as your device Internet Protocol ('IP') address, device name, operating system version, the configuration of the app when utilizing my Service, the time and date of your use of the Service, and other statistics.
privacyPolicy.4-p: Cookies are files with a small amount of data that are commonly used as anonymous unique identifiers. These are sent to your browser from the websites that you visit and are stored on your device's internal memory. This Service does not use these "cookies" explicitly. However, the app may use third party code and libraries that use "cookies" to collect information and improve their services. You have the option to either accept or refuse these cookies and know when a cookie is being sent to your device. If you choose to refuse our cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of this Service.
privacyPolicy.5-p-1: I may employ third-party companies and individuals due to the following reasons:
privacyPolicy.5-li-2: To provide the Service on our behalf;
privacyPolicy.5-li-4: To assist us in analyzing how our Service is used;
privacyPolicy.5-p-2: I want to inform users of this Service that these third parties have access to your Personal Information. The reason is to perform the tasks assigned to them on our behalf. However, they are obligated not to disclose or use the information for any other purpose.
privacyPolicy.6-p: I value your trust in providing us your Personal Information, thus we are striving to use commercially acceptable means of protecting it. But remember that no method of transmission over the internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure and reliable, and I cannot guarantee its absolute security.
privacyPolicy.7-p: This Service may contain links to other sites. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that site. Note that these external sites are not operated by me. Therefore, I strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of these websites. I have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party sites or services.
privacyPolicy.8-p: I may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Thus, you are advised to review this page periodically for any changes. I will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. These changes are effective immediately after they are posted on this page.

termsConditions.1-h1: Terms of Service for viggle ai video
termsConditions.1-p: Welcome to viggle ai video! Our website, located at https://viggleaivideo.com ("Website"), is dedicated to providing you with the ability to create custom images. By accessing or using our Website, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service ("Terms"). If you do not agree with any part of the terms, then you are prohibited from using the Website.
termsConditions.2-p: You are granted a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use the Website and its services for personal, non-commercial purposes. This license does not include any rights to copy, modify, or distribute the Website's content or use it for commercial purposes without our prior written consent.
termsConditions.3-p: The ownership of images generated from text on the Website belongs to the person who created the image. viggle ai video claims no ownership over images created by users.
termsConditions.4-p: We collect personal data (name, email, and payment information) and non-personal data (web cookies) to improve our services. The use of this data is governed by our Privacy Policy, which can be found at
termsConditions.5-p: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of the United States of America, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
termsConditions.6-p: viggle ai video reserves the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. We will notify users of any changes by email. Your continued use of the Website after any change in these Terms will constitute your acceptance of such changes.
termsConditions.7-p: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at contact@viggle ai video.
termsConditions.last-p: By using viggle ai video, you signify your acceptance of these Terms of Service.
